name: Stars Online
description:
Era After Zeta.

            A long time ago we thought the gods where our biggest problem, but that couldn't have been further from the truth.  We stepped on to a new playing field, and one that has already been dominated.  We finally reached space, but I am afraid it was  a little to late. An enemy has already set there eyes on our star system, it is up to you fight the Ilyx Knights who are a race of beings that exterminate other low level civilizations or in slave them. 

-Unlock new ships

-Unlock new gear

-4 ammo types.

-5 enemy types

-3 open space maps you can jump between

-4 Lite Story missions.

Starter quest

2 Special Codes that can be redeemed in the ship config Panel

Codes Valid for a limited time

A free Roll at a tier 3 Gear or an exotic tier 4 weapon: SO00-0119-0021

A starter Gift for free ship parts BirthdayLaunchCode2021

- This Game Will be getting seasonal Updates for the 1st year. 

after that it will be bug fixes and patches.

Seasonal updates will bring ship skins, titles, seasonal events, quests!

(Possible new free space maps, new npc's, new gear)

Requirements:

This game requires the game launcher to play! You can download it for free!!!

A special Thank you to the people who made resources for free use!

https://www.dropbox.com/s/vjug50d5ldcea08/ThankYou.txt?dl=0
